text:
If you’ve seen my messages and went “I’d like to contribute but don’t know how” or don’t know git I put up a page that should answer any questions you have.
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft/wiki/Getting-started-with-contributing-to-the-repo>

If you still have questions let me know

revamped the “new to git page”, I realize it was kinda confusing.
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft/wiki/New-to-Git-and-GitHub%3F>

I should also add for those just diving in - please let me know if you have any feedback on my instructions or anything. I want to make it so any developer feels comfortable giving it a go whether they’re comfortable with git or not.

A lot of HS devs have not used version control systems or have not used git in a long time and feel rusty. I want to make it painless.
